review: I bought this to use in hotel rooms. I ended up liking it WAY more than I expected to and actually use with my bedroom TV now instead of the PS4 we were using. If you need something for streaming, this is a great buy. I'll be buying one for my sister for Christmas. Even if you don't have Amazon Prime, it's great to use for Netflix. I have my Prime account, Netflix account, HBO Go account and Spotify account on all mine. I'm sure I could find more apps to add to it with more time and use. I've had a few people say to me "but I don't have a prime account". Although the "main" feature (the home screen) is for Amazon Instant Video, you don't need a prime account. The Netflix app alone makes this worth it. I was weary about this but bought it during Prime Day. If you're even remotely considering it, I think it's worth a try.The only thing that caught me off guard was that it needs to be plugged into an outlet while it's plugged into the TV. I don't know about things like that so I guess that makes sense. I just didn't understand that by the description or photos or anything. I had to move a few power strips around (or you could purchase a longer universal power cord if the supplied cord doesn't reach) but I made it work.
